group_1.textRight: Okay, okay, okaaay! Let's go, Konoha and@Hazuki!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3027A04]Sure thing!
We got this! Ayame, it's all you!

group_1.textLeft: I'll take it down! Here comes a huge one!

group_1.textRight: Outta my waaay! MOVE!
What're ya doin' wastin' time workin'@together fightin' these weaklings?

I'll take 'em out all at once!@[chara:100500:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100500:motion_200][chara:100500:cheek_0][chara:100500:face_mtn_ex_021.exp.json][chara:100500:lipSynch_1][chara:100500:mouthOpen_1][flashEffect:flashWhite2][se:6053_hit_strike_03_s][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Hwoaaagh!!!

group_1.textLeft: Uwagh! Watch it! What're you DOIN',@Felicia!
I almost got knocked over! YOU'RE the@one gettin' in the way!

group_1.textRight: Aw, shove it! You made me miss my target!
Hey, hey, hey! You two!

group_1.textLeft: Ayame! Felicia! Stop this at once!

I'm gonna beat it, I'm gonna beat it!@[chara:302800:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302800:cheek_1][chara:302800:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:302800:lipSynch_1][chara:302800:mouthOpen_1][chara:302800:motion_400][flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3028A01]HWAH!

group_1.textRight: Naw, I am! [chara:100500:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100500:motion_200][chara:100500:cheek_1][chara:100500:face_mtn_ex_021.exp.json][chara:100500:lipSynch_1][chara:100500:mouthOpen_1][flashEffect:flashWhite2][se:6053_hit_strike_03_s]BAAAAAAM!
We took out every Familiar, but the Witch@got away...

group_1.textLeft: And those two are still fighting. They're@even still in their Magical Girl forms...
Feliciaaa! Why'd ya have to get in the@waaay?!

group_1.textRight: I told you to get outta my way, didn't I?@I was gonna knock it out in one BAM!
It's 'cuz you can't fight properly that the@Witch got away!

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong with the way I fight, huh?!
Stop it, you two. Transform back, now!
I don't wannaaa! Fight me, Felicia!@Right here!

group_1.textRight: What a total waste of time! If there ain't@no Witch, then I'm outta here.
Fightin' a pain in the butt like you would@just be a headache.
At least if I go home I can watch TV.@I'm OUT.
If you wanna know who's stronger, just@think back on what just went down.
Who took all the Familiars out? Oh, yeah,@that was ME.

group_1.textLeft: Huh, huh, huh?[chara:302800:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302800:motion_100][chara:302800:cheek_0][chara:302800:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:302800:lipSynch_1] I'm the one who did that!
Hazuki! You saw, didn'tcha? I'm the one@who took 'em down, right?!

group_1.textRight: Sorry... It was kinda hectic back there.@I didn't really see.

group_1.textLeft: Whaaaaaa?! Konoha, you saw it, right?

group_1.textRight: I'm afraid not... But it's not important.
Stop all this silly squabbling. We're@going home.
Heh, yeah, run home, Ayame!

group_1.textLeft: Oooh, you rotten jerk! I'm gonna get@you for this!

group_1.textRight: Get me for what? I forgot already.@Who even are you?
Baby face!

group_1.textCenter: Mad, mad, mad!!! How DARE she?!
